features.name: Mythic Ability
features.desc: At 1st rank and every odd mythic rank thereafter, select one new mythic ability.

features.name: Demonic Rage
features.desc:
The power of the Abyss courses through the Demon waiting to be unleashed. The Demon can enter a demonic rage as a {g|Encyclopedia:Free_Action}free action{/g}. The demonic rage lasts until the end of combat. While in demonic rage, the Demon gains +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} and Reflex saving throws. The {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} for all {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against Demon's {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} and abilities are increased by 2. These benefits increase by 1 at 6th and 9th mythic ranks.
You can use Demonic Rage 3 times per day. Number of uses increases by 1 at 6th and 9th mythic ranks.

features.name: Demonic Claws
features.desc: The demon can grow claws at will, gaining two claw {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g}. These attacks are considered primary attacks and are made at the demon's full {g|Encyclopedia:BAB}base attack bonus{/g}. The claws deal {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}slashing damage{/g} (1d6 if Small) plus the demon's {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} modifier. If one of the claws is used in concert with a weapon held in the other hand, the claw attack is made at the demon's full base attack {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} –5 and deals 1d8 {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} plus half the demon's Strength modifier.

features.name: Demonic Charge
features.desc: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Move_Action}move action{/g}, you can teleport to the target enemy, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} unholy {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} per mythic rank to all enemies in a 10-foot range around the beginning point of the teleport and at the end point. An enemy can only be damaged by this ability once per {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}.

features.name: Mythic Feat
features.desc:
Mythic characters gain mythic {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feats{/g} every even mythic rank. These feats can be selected only as part of mythic advancement, not as part of a character's normal advancement or in place of any other bonus feat.
Most mythic feats require a non-mythic feat as a prerequisite. These mythic feats enhance the benefits of their prerequisite feats, making them truly awe-inspiring. If a character doesn't possess any of the necessary prerequisite feats when she gains a mythic feat, she can wait to select a mythic feat until the next time she gains a mythic rank or level.

features.name: Demonic Aspect
features.desc: Starting at the 4th mythic rank and every rank thereafter, Demon gains a Demonic Aspect. These aspects use other Demons as inspiration and allow the Demon to focus the rage more effectively.

features.name: Extra Minor Aspect
features.desc: You can now use one more minor aspect simultaneously.

features.name: Major Demonic Aspect
features.desc: At 5th rank and at 7th rank, Demon gains a Major Demonic Aspect. These aspects use more powerful demons as inspiration and allow the Demon to focus the rage more effectively.

features.name: True Demonkind
features.desc: At 5th mythic rank, you gain immunity to poisons and electricity.

features.name: Deadly Natural Weapons
features.desc: All demon's {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural weapons{/g} ignore {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g} of demons and count as having +2 enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}. Additionally, all demon's natural {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} count as primary.

features.name: Wings
features.desc: You gain a pair of wings that grant a +3 dodge {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attacks{/g} and an immunity to ground based effects, such as difficult terrain.

features.name: Demon Lord Aspect
features.desc: At the 9th mythic rank, Demon gains a Lord Demonic Aspect and another one on 10th mythic rank. These aspects use demon lords as inspiration and allow the Demon to focus the rage more effectively.
